name: Wumpus (Creative Computing)
overview: An updated German version of the famous Hunt the Wumpus strategy and logic game. The core of the game remains identical with the player hunting a Wumpus in a cave system. It has the following additional random events: Earthquakes, bat migrations, and what is described as the "turnareo" which changes the layout of the cave. Published in the book "More BASIC Computer Games - German Edition" This version varies from the Wumpus I and Wumpus 2 games released in the English versions of this book.
